rules_text:
[i]Reckless Youth[/i] – Rowan must attack or block each combat if able if another creature is attacking or blocking.
[i]Gather the Gleamstones[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, commanders you control get +1/+1 for each color among legendary creatures you control. Activate this only once each turn.
Partner with Lianna, Princess of Aytolis [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Lianna into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
